page.title: 17Leisure Activities
page.content: There is a golf course near the river Coquet which runs through Rothbury but many of the balls are lost in the water and carried by the current down to the deep pool by the Thrum Mill. There is a swimming pool attached to our school and it will soon be open to members of the public. New changing rooms have been built for this purpose. One of the hotels in Rothbury offers pony trekking and shooting. Another hotel offers fishing and there are plenty of interesting walks in the area. I often go trekking with my welsh cob who is sixteen years old. There are some good forest tracks and bridleways to follow also county show competitions to enter at Thropton, Whittingham,Glanton and Powburn.
